title: UCANBE Athena Face Body Paint Oil Palette, Professional Flash Non Toxic Safe Tattoo Halloween FX Party Artist Fancy Makeup Painting Kit For Kids and Adult
descriptions:
Introducing the UCANBE Athena Face Body Paint Oil Palette, the perfect professional makeup painting kit suitable for both kids and adults. This palette is perfect for Halloween, FX makeup, parties, and for artists of all skill levels.

The palette contains 20 vibrant colors, including gold, silver, pink, purple, red, yellow, blue, green, brown, black, and white. These colors come in both flash and Aqua types, allowing you to create a variety of artistic and special effects looks. 

The palette is conveniently packaged in a sturdy plastic case, making it easy to carry and store. You can apply the paint using either a sponge or a brush, and the oil-based formula ensures easy blending and comfortable wear. 

Not only is this paint non-toxic and skin-friendly, but it is also quick-drying, smudge-proof, and durable. With minimal rub-off, you can enjoy long-lasting wear without any worries. And when it's time to remove the paint, simply use olive oil or professional waterproof makeup remover for easy and fuss-free removal.

The UCANBE Athena Face Body Paint Oil Palette is perfect for all occasions, including festivals, carnivals, birthday parties, campfires, theme parties, stage performances, and Halloween. You can create a variety of looks, such as crowns, costumes, bruises, blood effects, and even cosplay.

Don't miss out on this high-quality, blendable, and vibrant face and body paint. Get your UCANBE Athena Face Body Paint Oil Palette today and unleash your creativity with ease! Suitable for kids and adults alike.

Introducing the UCANBE Athena Face Body Paint Oil Palette - the perfect makeup kit for all your artistic needs! This professional-grade painting kit is suitable for both kids and adults, making it ideal for Halloween, FX makeup, parties, and even professional artists.

With 20 vibrant colors in both flash and Aqua types, including gold, silver, pink, purple, red, yellow, blue, green, brown, black, and white, the UCANBE Athena palette offers a variety of artistic and special effects. The creamy and intensive texture ensures high pigmentation for a color-saturated finish.

The plastic case is sturdy and convenient, making it easy to carry and store. You can apply the paint using either a sponge or a brush, and the oil-based formulation ensures easy blending and comfortable wear. The colors are quick-drying, smudge-proof, and durable, with minimal rub-off.

Don't worry about safety - the UCANBE Athena palette is non-toxic and gentle on the skin. It's also easy to remove with olive oil or professional waterproof makeup remover. 

This versatile palette is perfect for festivals, carnivals, birthday parties, campfires, theme parties, stage performances, and of course, Halloween! You can create a wide range of looks, including crowns, costumes, bruises, blood effects, and even cosplay.

Whether you're a kid or an adult, the UCANBE Athena Face Body Paint Oil Palette is your go-to choice for all your artistic makeup and special effects coloring needs. Get yours today and unleash your creativity!
